typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		lin_no as integer,
		out_text as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'select out_text from _ecia_global_standard_region order by lin_no',
	format: 'query') ~> PrimarySelect
PrimarySelect select(mapColumn(
		out_text
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'datagactoryfiles',
	folderPath: 'ECIA',
	columnDelimiter: '',
	escapeChar: '',
	quoteChar: '',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionFileNames:['ECIAGlobalStandardRegion1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
